pli-tv-pvr1.13:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.13:1.1: (1) The offenses that are a result of having sexual intercourse, through how many of the six kinds of origination of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr1.13:1.3: from body and mind, not from speech. …
pli-tv-pvr1.13:3.1: Concluded is the Fifth Chapter: that on Origins
